Was charged $3 for extra 1oz scoop of pico and $2 for 1oz scoop of sour cream!!!!.. Jalapeno Margarita $40 and $8 side charge for Jalapeno!!!!!!! WTF!!!! I've been there Day evening week and weekends and it's busy, went today dead!!!! Loosing your customers due to your rip off prices!!! What a shame!!! Also pitcher margarita watered down too!!!! See what happens when you get greedy!!!

O9LrFteFqx4cl6DfKJGdsg.text: Best Mexican food in Vegas! Mike he bartender was awesome, highly recommend! The salmon is perfect great vegetarian options too!

TnRF54_hzV_6NBUuEfEqPg.text: Just had the best Mexican food in Vegas  We came in after seeing the billboard on the 15 fwy.  Had table side guacamole that was perfectly paired with fresh crisp chips. And street tacos that were stuffed with delicious carnitas, skirt steak and chicken. The Flan was the best I've ever had. Chef Paco came out to see how we liked the food and was such a nice person.  It is attached to the Shaphire gentelmens club

6G5nJaAbAWROEpYxhqMRwA.text: This place is wonderful! Enrique is the man! And locals -Mondays are 25% off!!! We eat clean and organic at-home so it's nice to be able to have a date night and not feel like crap after!! Highly recommend! Everything we have had has been perfect and if you're unsure ask Enrique he has great suggestions!

s6MU7KtfVxjnc-o5YKuGhA.text: This place is amazing. The food taste great and the staff is great. Love the quality of the food. Star lord was our server tonight and he did an amazing job. He was very attentive to our needs.

TsKwqeSfBa1-uKWwtX99Ew.text: I love this place! Carne Asada is the BEST! Drinks are fun and tasty too. Lively crowd and nice sophisticated atmosphere!! Can't wait to go back!

g9Ipl2WDMLxJOxDsfYQO2Q.text: The tacos I took a bite of were so rich in flavor that I couldn't stop eating them. Highly recommend this place to anyone wanting tasty tacos.

photos.caption: Photo of El Dorado Cantina - Las Vegas, NV, United States

qopjeZeTr5ugDE0fJ3BAjg.text: I would have love to give them more stars because I had anticipated the food to be authentic mexican food or at least close to it however to my disappointment it was not. I ordered a veggie bowl and sadly comparable to Chipotle, the latter wins. Sorry, El Dorado. The decor is amazing and the staff was great but the food did not make the cut. The alcoholic drinks were pretty amazing and strong enough to knock out a bull. So that was a plus. Come for the drinks and after a few I'm sure the food will be extraordinarily amazing as well.

Jphjl1CT121kwrVX8g1MfQ.text: A friend of mine recommended El Dorado, and I think it is my favorite place for Mexican food now.  Being from Albuquerque, NM I am pretty picky and I really love the look and feel, and the coolest thing is they make your Guacamole dip right in front of you and you pick the ingredients.  It is almost the perfect first date site, its proximity to the strip club prevents that in most cases.  I'll be back

z8UksO0qmBOg18dD_PshTg.text: Food was good but not out of this world. Had the street tacos. Place is right next to a strip club. Margarita was a bit above average. Main ding is the wait staff was very slow. Our waiter spent most of the time sitting in a booth talking to a lady with his back to us.

G-5BC6l_F2uxK4RqZSSnlA.text: While in Las Vegas for a convention at the convention center,  we were looking for great Mexican food of site of hotel. We found that yummy goodness at Eldorado Cantina.  We started with the complimentary organic chips and salsa and a pitcher of their house Margarita.  The margaritas were perfectly tart and not too sweet. Move on to Mole Negro cooked tender and juicy carnitas rojos burrito, and great service by Juan, means we'll be back!

HrEYtcSQq1nrBb7XSFTyHQ.text: The shrimp tacos and carne asada burrito were amazing. Shout out to our waiter, Chris. Thanks for a great meal!

dYPJyYPfpSod1lKo1PhYrQ.text: Great food, huge portions. By the time our meals came we could only take a couple bites from being full of delicious queso fundido. Chicken enchiladas, carne asada burrtio, and Mexican corn were great. Even as leftovers :) Our waiter Enrique was awesome too. We will definitley be back.

aMPQ9hS1Y3Ti140FTV_2lw.text: Amazing food, amazing service. El Dorado never disappoints. The manager Martine went above and beyond to make our experience great. This time we had a mix of Shrimp Tacos, Mahi Tacos, and chicken & steak fajitas. Every dish was excellent and tasted fresh and authentic.

EgIBipbHG-z5VPCrY1dgZg.text: Came here for dinner last night.  The hostess welcomed us warmly.  Our server was very attentive.   The food was incredibly flavorful and portion sizes were huge.   Looking forward to coming back and trying more things.  Make sure you check in on Yelp to get some delicious flan.

Ver21TCAc0jscp-8s6PqQw.text: Service was awesome and the chef even stopped by to chat. We had chicken bowl and chicken burrito. Both were great!  The cilantro lime rice was out of this world.  Close to the strip too.

bms9TBPy9mlY013M-Tlzug.text: Great Mexican food with a mostly organic menu.  A little odd walking in since it's adjacent to a strip club lol. Table side guacamole is a must!  Our party of 4 enjoyed everything we ordered from the Mahi tacos to the Elote to the fajitas.

_rxpRzsCn8apjGaUna7fTg.text: Love this place! Organic Mexican is a rarity, and 24/7 is a dream come True. Delicious food with generous portions. We could have shared our enchilada plates because they were so big. Yummy beans. Our server Ericka was sweet and helpful. She alerted us to the free flan, so we checked in. Will definitely be returning when next we find ourselves in Vegas!

3M0Q0PWdOnUTcyrUbSXaCA.text: We were in last week and have been in before several times. Our waitress was really nice. During our meal, we flagged her over to get more drinks. She looked upset and tried to cover it up. We asked her what was wrong and she finally told us that Paco the chef was yelling at her and being a huge jerk. She said she didn't even do anything wrong, he has such a bad temper.  Paco is so unprofessional and out of line to handle a back of the house situation like that. As someone who was in the restaurant industry for years, I knew to talk about issues at the end of a shift or on a day off, never in the middle.  I hope upper management steps in and reprimands Paco for his immature behavior. We will not be returning to the restaurant!

U5WWwMMDuFEZL-xLJMcrbQ.text: Came here from previous reviews and they were dead on. First we were warmly greeted by Chris who turned out to be our awesome waiter. We started with delicious queso fundido - mucho Bueno!! The chicken enchilada and pork dish was freshly made ,tender and delicious. Cilantro rice and beans were amazing. The best part is the general manager and the chef stop by to be sure we were happy and enjoyed our food.  So warm and caring. Everyone made us feel at home . Best meal in Vegas so far and reasonable as well. Oh and a delicious house margarita started the meal!! The flan, Grandmas recipe is the best we ever had. DON'T MISS IT!!! Thank you Chris and staff

Xmtkh0zuV9kp1rnLnRvm5g.text: I'm not sure where all the good reviews came from here. My service sucked,(both my cups had food in them) (our burrito was wrong even after sending it back the first time), and the food was mediocre. I ordered a Bloody Mary they charged me $14 for and it was one of the worst bloody Mary's I have ever had. There was no manager on the premises so the bartender assisted us with our complaints. She was very nice and did try to help us out the best she could. For now I'll stick with 1.50 tacos at a taco truck rather than eating at this place.

pQCXhmo-qrBbf7RUZkUWMQ.text: Had never heard of this place, but glad we found it. Reservations are probably best, we went Sat night 7/9/16 around 7pm and no tables avail had to sit at bar. Everyone was very friendly and attentive at bar, girls at front desk were kinda snooty but thank god we had no other interaction with them. We had Chicken Enchilada and Carne Asada burrito, both were very generous and full of great flavor. No Complaints! Chips and Salsa also were great, salsa's were fresh and full of flavor. We will Def be back.

z9B9ZkbC7REFtgGO03_a1Q.text: This place is amazing! All the produce is organic and the meats are anntibiotic and hormone free. And the food is very authentic Mexican. The steak was cooked perfectly and delicious. Honestly, their flan was the best I ever had! The waitstaff was very fast and friendly. The owner came out and greeted our family and made us feel like superstars. This is my favorite place to eat in Vegas. I hope they open one in LA.

7fMBthrTmqAKXlP_XMqb1g.text: Awesome food and great service! Enrique was great! The Carne aside burrito was delicious and not greasy. Had tres leches cake and berries with cream for dessert. Both were tasty and not too heavy.

JylIXwhWEjtuEh5yxhGPZg.text: Chris showed amazing hospitality. The food is delicious an tastes so fresh. I got the chorizo breakfast burrito and the potatoes that came with it were fantastic. My girlfriend got her usual chicken enchiladas and she loved it. It's just icing on the cake that the ingredients are responsibly sourced, GMO free and Organic. We will be coming back again!

-Aboubeh53l2W7gQl-S6lg.text: Love the food! Healthy Organic Mexican Food ;) Service is not the best though and location is not the best. I've been there a handle full of times and no matter what server I receive the services has not been good. That's the only down side. I still come because it's the only non gmo, organic Mexican spot so I endure the wait and not so attentive servers. Being completely honest.

kC42ZzQfI9I6uvf8JHILMg.text: I was craving some chillaquiles so we came here, didn't know they weren't crispy chillaquiles beforehand  (which are not my favorite) but hey I tried it and they were yummy! Especially the steak that came with it! Good combination! Ericka was our server, she was very nice! The chef even came out to greet us, nice guy too! We checked in on yelp and got a free flan, which is a must try! It tasted like a mixture of cheesecake and flan, so good and creamy!

e11BefrH5JcZn9IXkJxQzw.text: Great food friendly service. Awesome pozole and goes great with the street tacos. Looking forward to coming back he

DX10W8R4Sef8gfKWwVxJfQ.text: Omg amazing food. As vegans we ordered special food and they were quite accommodating.

UjG1xyUwTakzvcjnXkHyOQ.text: A True hidden gem of Las Vegas. I must admit while driving to this place I thought my GPS had made a mistake. Driving down the street there was several strip clubs, adult stores and seedy looking strip malls. When my GPS said I "arrived" all I could see was a big blue building that said "Sapphires" a strip club. Almost turning around I saw the restaurant and thought "how good is the food if it's attached to a strip joint."  Well I was fooled, the food was excellent and the service was great. I had the Pazole and it was as good as the homemade pazole I've had.  The waiter was very helpful when we were ordering. The margarita was a bit watered down but after a weekend of drinking I didn't mind.  My boyfriend had tacos and the chicken and carnitas and they were delicious!!

zHZ6fCvJf6SP__Vzj0iK6g.text: Joseph saved the day!  He is awesome!  Thanks for the delicious margs.  The food was fantastic.  I had the street taco called cochinita.  WOW!  Delicious! I would order them again and again!

dT7Wmz_tzGEvNZNaRuZURQ.text: This place isn't even deserving of one star. We came to eat at noon on a Sunday. We were a party of 4, the restaurant was empty and the service SUCKED!! It took the waitress 20 plus minutes just to bring us our drinks (2 sodas and 2 bloody Mary's) the Bloody Mary tasted like pure tomato juice  When our food finally did come the food was overly salty and half our order was wrong. I asked for a side of sour cream and was charged $2! WTF?! This place is way over priced and too Americanized. Not authentic at all. It was a total waste of our time and money!

szxrWVDoCT6GcAicIeO_vw.text: So impressed by this restaurant. I've scoured Vegas looking for a great Mexican joint, and this is it! Everything tasted fresh and was delicious! And bonus, locals get 25% off on Mondays! Can't wait to return!

QvHcHX7OZqf6rDQ2gD0FLA.text: We love the veggie burritos here, such delicious flavor! The margaritas are made with fresh ingredients and the service was great!  We will return next time we get to Vegas.

i5Ph8XsCe5mZEK-96eu5Fw.text: Excellent food and great service! The flan was amazingly creamy. Plus there menu is mostly gluten free and non gmo ingredients!

FLxhhWlTVd9SJwReoW9kpw.text: Such a fun spot!  I will say pulling up I was surprised as I didn't realize this restaurant is in the same building as the Sapphire strip club.  However, the ambiance, food and service are really good.  My friend and I split a few things- the queso fundido with mushrooms, a steak quesadilla and emapadas.  Everything was killer.  I also like the red and green salsa you receive when seated.  I liked my margarita, however it was a little on the too sweet side.  Other than that, the vibe was great, the service was good and the food was on point.  The entire restaurant was full when we arrived and when we left, so local and tourists enjoy this place alike.  Check it out!

_jHEqnBwJ8wl2o7xugkUgA.text: The best ever!!!! Want some good food and great service...Paco, Martine and Hugo were phenomenal....I enjoyed my shrimp and beef fajitas, fresh guacamole and margaritas... The water glass was continously refilled without my asking... Everything was good including my flan dessert....I can't wait to revisit when we are back in Vegas and I will tell everyone I know about your resturant!!!!

o2epmjDhPuz6whD2L93L4Q.text: Once of the best conchinita pibil tacos I've had. A bit spicy although is was habareno. Definitely making a go to spot when visiting Vegas.  Thanks Amber and Paco for the great service.

EOGPGZdncxB5oxRYbgnBqA.text: Oh my gosh. I'm in heaven. I hopped off the plane, into my rental car, and was wandering around. I saw a big billboard----a sign from God---- advertising El Dorado Cantina. After a quick search, I noticed a free flan check in offer! (Yes!!!!) I was quickly on my way. FYI it shares a parking lot with a gentleman's club. Parking is free! I love that it's off the strip! The ambiance is great. And the food is even better. The salsas were tasty, empanadas superb, and my street tacos were divine. And the cilantro lime rice is shaped like a mesoamerican pyramid! Cute! The flan was heavenly. And after it was presented, the Exec Chef Paco checked in to see how dinner was. I loved that personal touch! I will be back for breakfast! I'm in love with this little gem. Oh, it's also gluten + gmo free!

eYJwS_T2nf7Arqmu3LXvYg.text: Had the carne asada tacos and they weren't seasoned whatsoever. I was highly disappointed at the dryness and lack of flavor.  There was nothing authentic about the beans and rice, let alone the tacos. It's a wonder they've gotten such great reviews. Never going back!

6QjoSyJt4j0YBhvOzFRjcA.text: Very good food. Service somewhat slow. Need to ask to get Ice-tea refills. Quality of produce used is great. All fresh.

mAYf9itpN5Cky2g_cSl8kw.text: Went here for the first time on Wednesday evening and it was amazing!  The service was great and the homemade guacamole was very good!  I highly recommend ordering that. The restaurant was nicely decorated and the food was delicious!  I'll definitely be coming back again! = )

nG9l_8XDOLMN7-6H6AZ7rw.text: Finally found a good Mexican place in Vegas! So I tell my husband I want Mexican for dinner and he tells me he found a place his coworker heard about. We get there and we were like what the heck it's Sapphire gentlemen's club! Pretty funny but thank goodness it's separate from the club, just right next door. No glitter found in our tacos :)  Service was great! We sat at the bar and the guy serving us was so friendly and the chef came out to bring us our flan which was free for checking in. He gave us his card and asked us how everything was and said to enjoy his grandmas recipe. It was really creamy and delish, passed the husband test since he's a flan snob :)  We got the Siegal dinner send spicy chipotle tostadas (three big ones for 7.50 a steal) cilantro rice was yum! Also tried the tres leche in addition to flan.  White Sangria and Brazilian wax for drinks!  Thank goodness didn't order another meal b/c the portions are good, would not be able to eat anything else!  Will definitely be regulars.  Was just talking about how there wasn't any good Mexican restaurants in Vegas besides the fast food street taco places, but now I know! What a gem with nice people and good food with decent prices. Leaving full and happy!

Mqr8NEmTz9TJqq1Pyh4j4Q.text: Smallest water glasses I've ever been given at a restaurant. They were so tiny we probably had to flag the waiter down 25 times for refills. I came on a Monday for 50% off for locals and the service was below average. We sat down quickly and then it took 20 minutes for the waiter to take our order. We are in and out people and we were there for 1 hour 35 minutes. We got one appetizer and entrees. I would come back and sit at the bar but not at a table. Way too slow of service.

photos.caption: Photo of El Dorado Cantina - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Are these water glasses a joke?!

833Z0W3BXr6VV-ynNS5J_w.text: First things first: the door is hidden right next to the front door of the Sapphire Gentlemen's Club. A bit intimidating, especially when we drove around in circles looking for it, then entered to find a loud wedding party in the restaurant, and waitresses in red satin bustiers and fishnets--very Vegas, but it had us wondering, Is this part of the club? No! DO NOT BE DISSUADED!! The hostess assured us a quiet(er) seat in the back room, and that the wedding party was leaving soon. :) After the dubious entrance, we ordered margaritas and focused on the extensive menu. There weren't many people there; other than the yelp reviews it seems that there isn't much advertising for this place, and the waiter told us it had only opened a few months ago... but is open 24/7-- how dangerous!!   Our waiter and all the staff gave excellent service throughout the evening. The maragaritas were poured at our table and were hands down some of the best I've had-- and I'm from SoCal so we know a bit about Mexican food... and drinks. The food was incredible, and I only hesitate a little when I say one of the best Mexican meals I've ever had. I had the street tacos (carnitas and chicken), and split a bowl of posole with my husband. I'm used to more watery posole; this had the richest and most flavorful broth I may have ever tasted. Each in my party of four people agreed that it was an exceptional meal. I know I'm bubbling over here, but after living on the East Coast for a long time, this place was literally an oasis in the desert. And the red velvet rose wallpaper is fabulous. Do not miss this restaurant. Or the flan.

5zVHtFiJLFQbO7GgbOxvYw.text: Dinner for 4 we all had different dishes, and we all loved it, Panini was one of the best servers, she was very attentive and extremely friendly,  we will retur

RRVtvRqO_oj6ebUsMRbLOQ.text: Great find. And when I mean find...um, it's next door to the largest gentlemen's club in the world. I almost didn't go in. Wonderful surprise. Local, organic, non-GMO authentic Mexican dishes. Try the street tacos and a flight of their tequila.

vpdZCg5ZMAbGmbc6zOaimQ.text: FANTASTIC. All organic, locally sourced, grassfed, and GMO free ingredients, huge portions, good prices, and free flan with a check in. The service was wonderful, and the food was just to die for. It was a little confusing at first when we pulled up to the Sapphire Gentleman's Club. They share the same roof and parking lot, but are separate.

ZShErZPLKHjBD3-N9whTxg.text: What can I say simply the best Mexican food in the city of Las Vegas I recommend the grasshopper appetizer and the mole sampler plate. Server Amanda was kind, fast and friendly.  Good food good service.

photos.caption: Photo of El Dorado Cantina - Las Vegas, NV, United States

LHUQSJCkqnl5zD5gYab4JA.text: We came to El Dorado Cantina looking for some delicious Mexican food, and that's exactly what we found.   I was a little worried as we arrived, since the parking lot is shared with a gentleman's club. One inside the ambiance was wonderful. Our server was quick to greet us and brought some hot chips and a few different salsas.   We started with a chicken gordita appetizer. The chicken was so flavorful, I almost didn't notice the amazing corn pocket that it was tucked in. The chicken enchiladas were similarly amazing, with some of the best black beans I've ever had. The Al Pastor street tacos  here just the right balance of tender pork and sweet pineapple.   Overall this is a wonderful restaurant that I can't wait to visit again!

iqxwL8PU8tkDFoHKP3HGRg.text: Rafael was great and definitely made sure to help us out deciding which deserts to get... apparently,  if you can't decide on one,  get all of them! He was so right, everything was amazing!!!

photos.caption: Photo of El Dorado Cantina - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Rafael was great! If you can&#39;t decide on one,  get all of them! Everything was amazing!!!

ScMRQkYZD5br34alFjVMiA.text: Truly the best Mexican food in the western hemisphere,  and the nicest chef too! Cannot go wrong here, every item on the menu is worth trying!

upZOfXsPTp2xgTR_vaV4NQ.text: Being in Vegas with family we decided we should find some really good Mexican food.  Yelp did not disappoint.  The only downside was that this was in the same lot as a gentlemen's club and when approaching from the south it appeared it was in the club.  We passed it and decided to eat elsewhere with the family.    Later that night we decided we really wanted to check this place out and see if the reviews were legit.  It was bugging me that there were over 650 reviews and 4.5 starts but the place appeared that it was in the club.  Could it be True that the food is good in a strip club????  As soon as we pulled into the lot we realized the restaurant has a separate entrance than the club and was a GREAT spot!  The food was delicious and the service was spectacular.  Can't wait to go back to Vegas!

mDpUdeHKGrZRQhALeVOC0g.text: Great service and food. The assistant manager Martine as well as the chef has excellent customer service, I love it!

lSj1WnAAdsajRySNpGVbOQ.text: Incredibly good tasting food and top notch service by Neil. We hail from SoCal, so we know Mexican cuisine and food claiming to be Mexican. This is the real deal. You know that you are headed for a fantastic dinner when the chips and 3 varieties of salsa are literally perfect. We added the table side made guacamole that was in a word perfect. My daughters had the taquitos (best ever tasted), wife had the burrito (couldn't rave enough about it) and I tried the Cochinita Pibil. There wasn't a single plate that wasn't True perfect and authentic Mexican cuisine. Whoever came up with the recipes and to the man in the back who's job is to make these recipes daily, I am truly impressed. Thank you so much for everything!!!

photos.caption: Photo of El Dorado Cantina - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cochinita Pibil served on a banana leaf, pickled onions and habañero peppers, white rice and refried beans.

VzcQWR8AjOcWQYcNOHwdbg.text: Followed prior reviews and had the street tacos and was not disappointed as the El Pastor was excellent. Neil was an excellent waiter! Had the flan and it is as good as advertised! The deep fried ice cream was also good. Chef Paco makes a very nice presentation on your plate. He let us try his new creation of a cheesecake chimichanga with Mexican chocolate. Believe it will be a hit too! Hear they will have a Mariachi band on Tuesdays and Wine Down Wednesdays  that are 30% all wine and 1/2 off appetizers with live music. Give them a try!

ERDZf8qkyTzwf4fK7E80Sg.text: What delicious food they have. I celebrated my 30th here with my twin sister (we are out of towners) We were hoping it would have been a little more exciting and full of people on a Saturday night, but it was pretty dead. They did put large sombreros on our heads and sang Happy Birthday to us, so that was fun.   The food...man, it's been a couple of months, but I do remember really enjoying their rice and beans. I tried a couple of different tacos and liking them all. Everyone seemed to enjoy their food too as there weren't any complaints.   I'm not sure if I'd ever come back, since we only frequent Vegas a few times a year and Vegas has so much to try and see.

o9wp_6mOj23vQwzK0XfbRA.text: Very great and nice people here! Chef Paco is so polite and terrific! Their Mexican Chili has to be the best chili ever (besides my moms). Carne asada tacos are also a great choice! I never had flan before because I hear so many mixed reviews! A friend of mine who eats here a lot insisted I try it! I'm glad that I did! I recommend it highly for dessert! Over all I had a great experience all the employees are very nice and show great customer service. Even the manager checks to see how your meal and how your experience went, which rarely happens now when you eat in a restaurant! I will definitely be back!!

photos.caption: Photo of El Dorado Cantina - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Carmel Flan! Very delicious!

vo8V44-FMfvH2jM5Zbvf8Q.text: Just moved to LV and was looking for something good. Location scared us at first. Yet, didn't deter us and we're glad it didnt. Went for Taco tuesday and had their special on,  got tacos for $1 and they were awesome. Highly recommend the lobster taco, my favorite!!! But they were all good. The atmosphere was awesome with great music. Clean place. Our server Erica was very attentive as well! Will be returning for sure. Executive Chef Paco even brought our dessert out, nice touch.

2POj6qqBcYZEHsy0O9VSLw.text: Definitely the most Authentic Mexican Food in Vegas!!! Erica is a super nice server with a fantastic vibe! I had the Carne Asada Tacos which I highly recommend the best!

pXREaDqAGJARiKh2Dm611w.text: Great shrimp burrito!! Joel and Viktor make awesome margaritas! Awesome service and food overall!

N2reWaxVO9B6-kVPpJQ_hw.text: The food and service was spectacular! First time and it was a bachelorette party but we felt like QUEENS! Thank you for the amazing service and accommodations! We will be back!

Oyg8VajEUiXCwfNwa90N1g.text: The food here is so good you don't even notice the strip club next door. Lol.   But seriously,  it's good.   And when you check in, you get free flan!!   Yay!

6_plWjMo1vBtuwmMtGZCyw.text: So lovely. Delicious food that's organic and non-GMO! Best in Las Vegas! =)

Vzo6BRu-h3CjDZcf6ebo9A.text: Thank you Chef Paco !!  Best fajitas and chicken enchiladas !!  Extra-ordinary experience with Chris, helping us select what would be great, and preparing an AMAZING guacamole !!  Chris, and Christian the manager have a great presence that added a fun and engaging time !!  Please ALL of you come with the restaurant to Los Angeles !!!!  We need quality out here !!!

G8rZEbQ9phDz718jR1ZIjQ.text: IEldorado!! One of my fav after work, it's my Friday, spots. Everything is consistent, the food,the atmosphere and the vibe are always great!! Joana was great at serving it up at the bar... come have a drink or grab a bite!!

0X4AgXm-5S8-1W5RWTwMjA.text: We love this place. So much so that we bring all of our out of town guests here when they come to visit. Our waiter was Hugo and he was wonderful. I always appreciate friendly service. He made us the best table side guacamole! Tonight we had fajitas and the street tacos. Both were amazing. Make sure to order a margarita. The bar here serves up some fantastic drinks! If you have room try the fried ice cream or the flan for dessert. Both are amazing.

--VlZ3fpoAiTEOIkBx_pPQ.text: Everything is exelent the drinks,food and deserts, You are the best  Chef PACO . Thank you for having us for my daughters graduation party...As always simply the best

ePyZDpNetR8dKoK0Gdai2w.text: I had high expectations for this restaurant because I've only heard good things about it. Maybe I was there on an off night but I just wasn't pleased.   I came on a Monday because I heard about their local special.   We were sat almost immediately upon arrival which was nice.   But then our server came over. And he was weird. He seemed stoned. No joke.   They bring you chips and salsa almost right away which was nice. However, it's spicy salsa and their water glasses are essentially over sized shot glasses. I was with 3 other people and WE ALL were going through these glasses of water in less than 3 minutes a pop. I swear the poor bus boy had to fill our glasses 15 times.   We asked for a pitcher of water and the server brought over a pitcher that was the size of a regular glass. (I wish I was kidding).  If you own a MEXICAN restaurant and serve SPICY food then the water glasses should be NORMAL SIZE! I was so annoyed by this.   We got the steak quesadilla for an appetizer and that was very good.   But then after that... We waited over 45 minutes for our dinner. We were seated at 8:20 and didn't get our dinner until 9:25. On top of that? The food wasn't great. We each ordered different tacos (Chicken, Fish, and Carne Asada). And all three were  bland and boring.   The refried beans were gross. I LOVE refried beans and I couldn't even eat a second bite of these.   The only thing I didn't try were the drinks (they looked very good) and I might come back to try them but I won't be ordering any food. I'll be sitting at the bar.

photos.caption: Photo of El Dorado Cantina - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Smallest water glasses ever. The picture doesn&#39;t even do it a justice.

3vSLvMcpBjy5A1pS7IcyJQ.text: We eat here often. We love to take visitors here. We always have fantastic service and incredible food. It's almost impossible to find the quality (non-gmo) food anywhere. Our bartender tonight, Nell, was exceptional, helpful, and full of energy. It doesn't hurt that they have a fabulous happy hour and Monday night locals night for 25% off. Love it here!

3sbvOPz9tCr2wCUEa6INKQ.text: yes, its next to a strip club! The food portions are huge! guacamole dip was massive. Ordered a bunch of tacos and tostadas that we didn't even finished. We ordered a pitcher of sangria, also did not finished. Our server was super sweet. We forgot to mention that we did not want cheese and he kindly got us another order. The chef came out an said hi too! All around nice.

photos.caption: Photo of El Dorado Cantina - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Next to a strip club

pq481p4djg5c9ijqyJE5cQ.text: Truly a amazing place, from the service to the food. The only thing if you make a reservation on Yelp it's not accurate, they have a different app for reservation according to the hostess so I would advise you to call instead. It was worth the the wait though  they have food to meet everyone's needs. Yes even vegan, gluten and so on

ouP2YWpYVzzG4WtI2aW3iA.text: Nell is my guuurrrrl!!! Sat at the bar tonight. Best. Decision. Ever. Great service and amazing food as per usual. Had the Al Pastor tacos... delish. Of course the margaritas hit the spot. Love this place!!! Always a great time. Now to wander on over next door.

l-WJ9_UX_4nS4U0DKHc3AA.text: Wow. Thought the best Mexican food was in Los Angeles, this place has proved me wrong. Please do yourself a favor and add anything with Carne Asada to your order, its super tender. Oh and btw, its all organic, non-GMO ingredients, that's a win-win.

Qvdp75-FFEnLnkGU5_GoCQ.text: Ordered the Veggie Bowl... meh  was a small portion of beans and rice and less than 2 table spoons of diced tomatoes and tiny amount of guac for 15.00  They say everything on their menu is organic non gmo. I would love to see an independent 3rd party come confirm this to see if they are being honest.  One extra star earned for putting up billboards to educate those unaware of what is happening to our foods.

VPxwBEYu6fbTqzdURwHKUg.text: I'm so glad I found this place! Great food great staff! But most of all everything is organic! Definitely coming back.

rcxdli1dVFne3PTvDidQWQ.text: Let me start by saying i love this place. I eat here often and most of the time leave happy. However after seeing a picture of the chicken wings on facebook i was dying to try them. An order of 6 wings is $12.50. I know everything is organic so i expect to pay more. That being said this still seemed rather pricey. Being a big wing man i figured i would give them a shot anyway. I ordered 2 orders because six wings would not fill me up. Here is the really bad part. Most of the wings were the smallest i have ever seen. For over $2 a wing this was an absolute rip off. I ate about half of them and just decided to give up. So this is a warning. Do not order the wings!!

jCpovCUid55cARstVqJyag.text: * Vibrant Decor * Fresh ingredients  * Balanced and developed flavors * Solid service * Just a great value - def coming back next Vegas visit. **Table-side guac is my pick to click here. So good.

ItvjYJ1qlQOaE_we9zsmsQ.text: The location of this establishment is right next door to a gentleman's club. The staff was courteous and promptly sat us down. I had the tacos de carne asada. They were tender and full of flavor. My husband had the menudo and he said it was good, but not great. He said it lacked some spice. Overall, had a really good experience and the food was tasty.

ce4c2Eeab4g11zguUrfjfw.text: This is hands down the most incredible Mexican restaurant I have ever eaten at. Everything is organic and non-GMO, the service is great, and the food is flat out amazing. I ate there last weekend and was served by Maria and also got to meet the manager Martine. Both of them were extremely friendly and Maria was very helpful when it came to food recommendations. I ordered the beef nachos and chicken fajitas along with the fresh guacamole that was prepared right in front of me. I don't think I have ever had such tender and well prepared meat at any other restaurant. I HIGHLY recommend this place if you are around Vegas. I'm from California and we have good Mexican food out here, but there is no competition to El Dorado Cantina. Also it's open 24 hours which is a huge bonus.

5UjNIRIZ4wHoqrdpahHZvQ.text: I'm visiting with my mom from Southern CA and I loved this place the interior was nice loved the red material on the wall the lamps etc however the door is literally next to a strip club so if it's your thing awesome food tasted great server was nice I plan to come back again at some point

G-nFraE5cuJ6UttZTRA2QA.text: The wife and I were staying on the strip and wanted to get away from the tourists and eat at a more local friendly spot. Thanks yelpers, this place was a pleasant gem. Enrique was great with the service, food was quick and hot and kept our glasses full. Great personality as well. Paco the executive chef came out and personally delivered the free flan yelpers get for checking in. Wish I lived closer so we could visit more often.

gm-I6uHbDZJafHRQTRj4-g.text: Food is great there and I have had wonderful experiences there- until this morning. My friends and I went here to eat after a late night out. Usually the food comes out quickly, however, on this particular morning it took quite a bit. One of the guys that came later and ordered after Us ended up Getting his food first. I gave the bartender a hard time about it thinking he must've forgotten the rest of our food order. Well, in all my years of working in hospitality and the service industry, I know how frustrating customers can be. Perhaps I was frustrating this morning, however, when the bartender told me to "shut the f**k up" (exact words he used) my desire to ever set foot in this restaurant disappeared. I was in shock. This caused a huge commotion among myself and my friend and we were asked to leave the establishment. As I left I happily gave him a piece of my mind. Hopefully no one ever experiences what I did.   Have to give another poor rating to this restaurant. First of all, after being told to shut the f*** up by the drunk bartender on duty there one morning, I have yet to hear a peep out of the managers of this restaurant. But whatever, not too shocked about that. However, this bartender continues to talk about that night and lying about the facts of what happened. He continuously talks bad about my friend and I to whoever he thinks will listen. I'm sorry, but I don't know what kind of business owners are okay with having a person like that- classless and rude- to be employed and represent their brand the way he does. Keep on coming with the rude comments about CUSTOMERS, who got cussed at and thrown out because we were upset about our delay on our order. I happily returned the insults To him on my way out the door. In any case, the longer he tries to smear my name and my friends, the longer I will continue w the Yelp reviews. Hope he gets drunk at work again tonight!. Good service can make up for bad food, but good food CANNOT make up for bad service.  Little update on this place

5tZcndwPGL6FXgt_gXfsQQ.text: We searched Yelp to find a good Mexican restaurant in the area. We visited based on the high ratings. We were not disappointed.  The service was great. The Manager came over a few times to check on us and talk. My husband had the carnitas street tacos and I had the shrimp tacos. Both were very tasty. We also tried the flan. It was EXCELLENT and was hand delivered by the executive chef who thanked us for visiting. I was definitely impressed with both the food and customer service.

KF7zQvs0WwMmAcS7LS3OrA.text: We were craving Mexican food and yelp lead us in this direction.  The food is delicious and presented beautifully. Salsas are awesome! Friendly service and the establishment was spotless.  I can't wait to go back to Vegas and enjoy this restaurant again.

YIJBjfgZqTzsqjqxqsLl0A.text: Mexican food adventure.  Fresh ingredients, excellent friendly service.  Chris, our waiter, was very patient with are order; very professional.  Loved the place; would come back anytime.

QUELHBElOtUtj3g2NrsLJw.text: El Dorado is an excellent addition to Mexican cuisine here in Las Vegas! I love that they offer a huge range of non GMO and organic and gluten free dishes. The service was great and the food was delicious. We loved the table side guacamole! Thanks Chef Paco!! We will be back!

nFQFGRhf2FQvI4_dB5yCtg.text: If you like organic and non-GMO food that is freshly prepared with just enough flavor to enjoy, but not over power your pallet this is it. The table side guacamole is fantastic. Okay, I know allot of restaurants do this now, but this is very efficient and they don't interrupt you to tell you about the finer points of avocados, garlic and lime juice. They just make it quickly and set it down. Today our table had the Cedar Chipotle Salmon, and the Pineapple Shrimp. The flavors in these two jewels come at you from different angles to create a center of happiness. On my previous visit I had the Shrimp Tacos.Too many restaurants cook the shrimp until they are as hard as rubber balls. Finally someone can cook shrimp and leave the flavor and texture in place. Don't let the address on Industrial fool you. This Cantina could be in any premium Strip hotel.

2LLT1XaweBDblQ_gPvCA0A.text: I found this place using Yelp, and it is a tucked-away treasure. We happened to wander in on a Monday night and we're lucky to learn Mondays come with a 25% locals discount. Prices were really reasonable anyway, with most dishes under $15 a plate. The guacamole was fresh and amazing. The chips were fine vessels to deliver the three kinds of delicious fresh salsa. All the dishes we had were amazing. My husband ordered the Carne asada, and said usually when he gets it other places it is only tender when it is hot but this stayed juicy throughout. My son had a burrito- he doesn't even like  Mexican food and said it was fantastic. The cilantro rice was yum. I had the street tacos- you can mix and match- so I had one chicken and two beef. All slow-roasted, each perfect.  The food was clean- not the over-piled plates of many Mexican restaurants that trade in quantity for quality. Portions were perfect-sized and we took home some leftovers. To top it off, our server Christopher was fast and courteous, really really excellent service, the kind that shows up exactly when you need it, not missing a beat. He was friendly without unnecessary check-ins and seemed legit happy. The chef brought out a piece of flan that we shared between the five of us- necessary because we all stuffed ourselves on dinner. It was the best flan I've ever had. Chef Paco said it was his mom's recipe, from Mexico City. All five of us large hungry adults ate for $75, feeling satisfied about a really great meal. I love this place. Highly recommended.

photos.caption: Photo of El Dorado Cantina - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Five adults ate for $75 on Monday (w/locals discount). Best prepared food I&#39;ve had in a while. Great atmosphere and service.
Photo of El Dorado Cantina - Las Vegas, NV, United States. We could barely stop for a pic, so delicious. The flan had a cheesecake-like texture and great flavor.
Photo of El Dorado Cantina - Las Vegas, NV, United States. A mix of street tacos- meat so juicy, perfect pairings.

IIBgBb4mB6S1sONfWkDlmg.text: A hidden gem close to the strip. Our first time here. The best carnitas burrito I've had. The meat is tender and full of flavor. Had a taste of the street carne asada tacos too. Our server Enrique made the visit even better.

1jOPL24MQzMdQlj8m7RWxA.text: Love this place. Great food and drinks. Chilaquiles are amazing. Great service. Salsa is great. I Recommend this place. Juan was a great server.

JMl1R9Z7EvnbPeJs0NueWw.text: Excellent food. Tons of flavor. Non GMO, gluten free, etc... Very health conscious for Latin food. Blows any high end Mexican Restuarant on the strip out of the water!!!

6YGGo8dEt8_TIHx3Oe4MEg.text: Wow ! We love organic food so we were very excited to eat here we ordered the steak and shrimp fajitas, table side guacamole, and one more I forgot but it was ALL delicious! I loved the decoration , full bar, and customer service. It's a popular place so make reservations. We can't wait to go back.

WWIjXl0OEGBRhHeGewFZMQ.text: The best Mexican food in Vegas. The staff is amazing and very knowledgable of their menu. I've never had a better experience. When we got our desserts we were greeted by chef Paco. He was extremely nice and loved meeting his guests. This is an amazing restraunt!

NtPMEZuoFWx-M88N8oXdFw.text: This place is delicious and service is amazing Will be coming back again when I come to Vegas

GwdGgl10Gxb4tVsoXsUEKg.text: Their tacos are soooo delicious and fresh. I'm all about non GMO so when I heard about this place I was like heck yeah count me in. Also the rice they use is very good too I kinda wanna ask where they get it from. Its next to a strip club but hey nobody's complaining! haha you'll see me here often!

5yw0H64sHK5mlOLIw7_IQA.text: Excellent food and service. Really beautiful atmosphere, and subtle music. We got the chicken and shrimp fajitas and they were the best we've ever had!

cSGYT-ggcoA__KfQiRP4gQ.text: Ericka smashes avocados like no other!!! Get her famous table side guacamole. ..or or haven't fully experienced life!!!  The drinks are muy delicioso! Chef prepared his Abuelita's flan. ..and I am literally in Heaven!!! Five stars is not enough!!!

TwW2qwNlQ1W6bU17oghkiQ.text: Chef Paco offers authentic Mexican cuisine in a great atmosphere although it is loud sometimes.  located right next to sapphire so you may or may not see some extra eye candy.. guacamole made at table side is outstanding. if I could give it 4.5 stars I would as whenever I have been there they are short on staff and there is always an excuse from the server or bartender who has to come serve you. don't make excuses, hire more phuckin people and don't make me wait. the complimentary nachos and salsa are a good touch and the habanero is pretty good. bonus points for location but I would recommend heading here after you are next door as the ladies probably wont appreciate your not so heavenly bombs during a lap dance.

mfhHfniDrACSsCq746ATFQ.text: Neil our server was amazing. He was very attentive to us. Was there right away with anything we needed. Make sure you ask for him to serve you. FOOD was amazing asada, al pastor and carnitas tacos all where tasty and ghosts pepper table salsa was amazing if you like hot food.

eFAIgqWIXq40eT71Fiz7Dg.text: All I can say is wow.  The restaurant is in the same building as Sapphire with a separate entrance next to the Gentleman's Club.   It's very upscale with the typical entree running around $20 bucks or so.  The table side Guac is amazing.   The drinks are very pricey with a standard Margarita costing $11 and a pitcher costing $32 and you'd say those better be good Margaritas and trust me when I say they are.   All fresh ingredients and no sour mix and they don't use mystery Tequila.  The Street Taco section of the menu has a great selection and they're all terrific.    If you're a local then you know to go on Mondays.   Did I mention they're open 24/7. Only Vegas baby.
